title: New League Client Won't Work Properly
body:
I just got the new league client, and I can only see the upper half of the client, and I can see this all over the little portion I can see. This is also just a small part, I can see this stuff covering the username, and the password area of the client. I've tried to press the button that takes me back to legacy but it's cut off my screen.


    cursor: default; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-user-select: none; background: linear-gradient(#010a13, transparent 18%); } lol-social-sidebar .panel { flex: 1; } lol-social-sidebar .alpha-version-panel { color: #3c3c41; display: flex; align-items: center; box-sizing: border-box; width: 100%; height: 32px; border-top: 1px solid #1e282d; padding-left: 40px; } lol-social-sidebar .alpha-tag { flex: 1; text-align: center; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; } lol-social-sidebar .bug-report-button { background-image: url(https://127.0.0.1:51554/fe/lol-social/report_bug.png); background-size: cover; background-position-y: 0px; width: 30px; height: 30px; } lol-social-sidebar .bug-report-button:hover { background-position-y: -30px; } lol-social-sidebar .bug-report-button:active { background-position-y: -60px; } lol-social-sidebar .bug-report-button:disabled, lol-social-sidebar .bug-report-button[disabled], lol-social-sidebar .bug-report-button.disabled { cursor: default; background-position-y: -90px; } lol-social-sidebar .chat-toggle-button { position: absolute; bottom: 0; } lol-social-status .status-message { font-family: 'LoL Body', Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; } lol-social-status .status-message { -webkit-user-select: none; } lol-social-status .status-message { font-kerning: normal; -webkit-font-feature-settings: "kern" 1; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; } lol-social-status .status-message { color: #a09b8c; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; line-height: 16px; letter-spacing: 0.025em; -webkit-font-smoothing: subpixel-antialiased; } lol-social-status .status-message { font-family: 'LoL Body', Arial, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; } lol-social-status { display: flex; overflow: hidden; } lol-social-status .status-message { flex: 1 1 auto; color: inherit; font: inherit; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; } lol-social-status .status-message.game-status { color: #09a646; } lol-social-status .status-message.chat { color: #09a646; } lol-social-status .status-message.spectating { color: #0acbe6; } lol-social-status .status-message.dnd { color: #0acbe6; }

replies.body:
This looks similar to the errors that the Beta Client is throwing for some Macs running a really old version of macOS (10.7). If this describes you, then you'll need to update your Mac to a newer version of macOS (if possible), otherwise, we'll have to bypass the Beta Client for now.

Let me know if you have any questions.
